blog.description: In addition to practical tips and recipes, you will also find interesting articles on the origin and history of different types of meat on our blog. For example, learn more about the origin of Wagyu and Iberico meat, and how these breeds differ from other types of meat.
blog.title: Inspire yourself with the Gustor Blog & recipes

index.deliveryDescription: We deliver your order safely, refrigerated and quickly to your home on your chosen day.
index.description: Home meat delivery: easy, reliable and super tasty. Can I have real meat delivered to my home? If so, how?
index.orderDescription: Explore our wide range of exceptional meats and order your favorite cuts.
index.pakkingDescription: We carefully pack each order with special packaging to ensure the freshness of our meat.
index.title: How is the delivery of the meat you order online done?

index.description: Do you have questions about our products, delivery or other issues? Below is an overview of the most frequently asked questions with our answers.
index.description2: Is your question not listed here? Please do not hesitate to contact us, we will be happy to help you.
index.faqGeneralBody: Here you will find answers to frequently asked questions about Gustor and our products. Can't find an appropriate answer? Then feel free to contact us.
index.faqOrderAndDeliveryBody: Questions about orders and deliveries at Gustor? Here are the answers to some frequently asked questions. Can't find an appropriate answer? Do not hesitate to contact us.
index.stillHaveAQustionsDescription: Can't find the answer right away? Contact us.
index.title: Frequently asked questions - FAQ

index.aboutSection1Description: At Gustor Meat Boutique we go beyond the traditional butcher, discover our unique selection of the highest quality meats. We select not only by breed, but also by color, aroma and fat percentages.
index.aboutSection1Title: Our offerings begin where the traditional butcher stops
index.aboutSection2Description: We look for the best origin for each breed. This is why, for example, we source our Rubia Gallega from Galicia, our Holstein from Austria and our Wagyu directly from Japan. Through this careful selection, we guarantee the highest quality and the best taste.
index.aboutSection2Title: The best origins for each race
index.aboutSection3Description: It's all about artisanal craftsmanship at Gustor. Our butchers are experts at cutting and preparing the meat so that each piece reaches the customer in the best possible way. Someone who contacts Gustor will always get a real butcher on the line.
index.allCategoriesSubtitle: Discover our carefully selected and freshly prepared range of top quality meats: from perfect steaks to juicy burgers. Or do someone a favor and give them a Gustor gift certificate as a present!
index.approachStep1Description: Explore our wide range of exceptional meats and order your favorite cuts.
index.approachStep2Description: We carefully pack each order with special packaging to ensure the freshness of your meat.
index.approachStep3Description: We deliver your order safely, refrigerated and quickly to your home on your chosen day.
index.approachTitle: How exactly do we proceed with Gustor?
index.bbqSubTitle: Nothing conjures up summer like a delicious BBQ with friends and family. Make sure you have the perfect meat in the house to make your next BBQ a memorable occasion.
index.faqCategory1Item1Description: At Gustor, we believe it is important to offer only the highest quality meat to our customers. This is why we look for the best origin / provenance for each breed. For example, we source our Rubia Gallega only from Galicia, our Holstein from Austria and our Wagyu directly from Japan.
index.faqCategory1Item1Title: Where does your meat come from?
index.faqCategory1Item2Description: Immediately after delivery, store the meat in the refrigerator at 7Â°C (4Â°C for poultry) or lower in its original packaging. Freezing is also possible, at -18Â°C or lower. Let the meat rest and come to room temperature at least 15 - 30 minutes before use.
index.faqCategory1Item2Title: How should I store the meat?
index.faqCategory1Item3Description: When stored below 7Â°C, vacuum packaging guarantees total freshness of 8 days after receipt. For poultry, it is 4 days when stored below 4Â°C. In the freezer, you can store the meat for up to six months. Products are shipped fresh and have not been previously frozen unless otherwise stated on the website.
index.faqCategory1Item3Title: How long can I store the meat?
index.faqCategory1Item4Description: Yes, it is safe to order meat online from Gustor. We take food safety very seriously and comply with all applicable regulations and standards. Additionally, we use only safe and secure payment methods to process your order.
index.faqCategory1Item4Title: Is it safe to order meat online?
index.faqCategory1Item5Description: We pack the meat in special coolers and use cooling elements to keep the meat cool during transport. This keeps the meat nice and fresh and of excellent quality on arrival.
index.faqCategory1Item5Title: How is the meat packaged and shipped?
index.faqCategory2Item1Description: We accept Bancontact, credit cards such as Mastercard or Visa, iDEAL, PayPal and SOFORT Banking
index.faqCategory2Item1Title: What payment options do you accept?
index.faqCategory2Item2Description: The delivery time of an order depends on the order day and time of ordering. Orders must be placed before 9 a.m. to be delivered the next day between 8 a.m. and 8 p.m. Delivery takes place Tuesday through Saturday. Different than normal delivery days and order deadlines apply during year-end holidays.
index.faqCategory2Item2Title: What is the delivery time of my order?
index.faqCategory2Item3Description: Yes. By the way, it is also possible to choose a time block for the delivery of your order. However, it is important to stress that choosing a time block does not give absolute certainty about the exact time of delivery, unlike choosing a specific delivery day.
index.faqCategory2Item3Title: Can I have my order delivered on a specific day?
index.faqCategory2Item4Description: Yes, once your order has shipped, you will receive an email with tracking information. That way you can track your order and know when it will be delivered to you
index.faqCategory2Item5Description: If you have placed an order with Gustor and wish to cancel or change it, it is important to contact our customer service team as soon as possible. At Gustor we strive for 100% successful deliveries, therefore it is very important to contact us immediately if something goes wrong. Depending on the status of your order, it may be possible to change or cancel it.
index.faqCategory2Item5Title: Is it possible to cancel or change my order?
index.faqCategory2Item6Description: We want all of our customers to be satisfied with their order. If for any reason you are not satisfied with your order, please contact us and we will do our best to solve the problem. We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee on all our products.
index.faqCategory2Item6Title: What if I am not satisfied with my order?
index.faqDescription: Do you have questions about our products, delivery or other issues? Below is an overview of the most frequently asked questions with our answers. Is your question not there? Please do not hesitate to contact us, we are happy to help you.
index.heroSubtitle: Our offerings begin where the traditional butcher stops.
index.heroTitle: Top quality fresh cut meat delivered chilled to your home
index.reviewsSubTitle: Read what our customers have to say about their experiences with Gustor! From the quality of our meat to the speed of delivery, we are proud to share their feedback. Let us know what you think of us and share your own review!
index.title: Gustor Meat Boutique - Online Butcher - Exceptional Meat

index.newClientDescription: By creating an account in our online store, you will be able to store faster, be up to date on an orders status, and keep track of the status of previous orders.
index.title: Welcome! Please sign in.

index.cartEmptyBody: Oh no! Your shopping cart is empty and feeling a little lonely. Fill your cart with some juicy burgers, delicious sirloin steaks or spare ribs and you'll thank yourself for feeding your inner carnivore!
index.contactUs: Having problems with your shopping cart or ordering? Then contact us at +32 473 60 06 22
index.dateOfPickingDescription: If you wish to pick up your order today, please call us before 11am. Pickup is possible Monday through Friday before 3 pm. It is not possible on weekends, holidays or the day before a holiday.
index.orderNote: Order over â¬200 euros and get a free gift!
index.timeTipNote: However, choosing a time block during the day is never a 100% guarantee.
